ygData.subject: Re: Something...
ygData.msgSnippet: Troll is a race actually, not hybrid class.  Shadow knight I guess is considered as hybrid - coz it s a mixture of warrior and necro.  In AD&D, we have
ygData.messageBody:
Troll is a race actually, not hybrid class. Shadow knight I guess is
considered as hybrid - coz it's a mixture of warrior and necro. In AD&D,
we have paladin, fighter/thief, cleric/mage etc as hybrid. Class like
warrior, thief, mage, cleric r straight classes. I guess it's similar for
EQ.

On Monday, June 14, 1999 4:30 PM, Wilson [SMTP:ritzbits@...]
wrote:
> Greetings ;-)
>
> Troll is not considered as a hybrid class I *think*. Yeah, the 50% is
true cos they can't even do simple addition. Ok, pure low intelligience.
Anyways, I'll rather play a Orge ShadowKnight instead. <winks>
>
> Wilson
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Sereph
>
> Troll Shadow Knights are surpose to be good??? Come on, they level up
at a snail place (25% pentalty for being a hybrid class, additional 50% for
being a troll I think) and Harm touch is useless as it can be resisted.
> << File: ATT00004.htm >>
